title: Mars Transit in the 6th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Mars transits the 6th house for Scorpio Ascendant, energy is directed toward work, discipline, competition, and problem-solving. This is a strong phase for confronting challenges, overcoming obstacles, and asserting control over routines. Determination increases, making it easier to defeat rivals or clear pending issues. However, impatience can trigger conflicts with coworkers or stress-related health issues. When Mars is channelled through structure and restraint, this transit strengthens resilience, efficiency, and the ability to win daily battles constructively.

sections.title: Work & Discipline
points: Strong focus on efficiency and output

closing: This Mars transit empowers Scorpio Ascendants to confront challenges head-on. Victory comes through discipline, not aggression.
